trans-unit.source: Identifies the level type for a switch.
trans-unit.target: 标识为交换机级别的类型。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is intended to be applied to all classes that inherit from the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch> class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性旨在应用于所有类都继承<xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch>类。</xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch>

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the attribute is to identify the type that specifies the switch criteria of the switch.
trans-unit.target: 该属性旨在识别指定的开关的交换机条件的类型。

trans-unit.source: Each switch determines whether a trace is to be written, based on whether an event type matches or exceeds the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.SwitchLevelAttribute.SwitchLevelType%2A> property for the switch.
trans-unit.target: 每个开关确定是否跟踪是写入，根据事件类型是否匹配或高于的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.SwitchLevelAttribute.SwitchLevelType%2A>交换机的属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.SwitchLevelAttribute.SwitchLevelType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type used for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.SwitchLevelAttribute.SwitchLevelType%2A> property varies for different switches.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的类型<xref:System.Diagnostics.SwitchLevelAttribute.SwitchLevelType%2A>属性因不同的交换机而异。</xref:System.Diagnostics.SwitchLevelAttribute.SwitchLevelType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the switch level type for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch> class is <xref:System.Boolean>, and the switch level type for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSwitch> class is <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，交换机级别类型的<xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch>类是<xref:System.Boolean>，和交换机级别类型的<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSwitch>类是<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel> </xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSwitch> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.SwitchLevelAttribute"></xref> class, specifying the type that determines whether a trace should be written.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.SwitchLevelAttribute"></xref>类，同时指定类型，它确定是否应写入一个跟踪。

trans-unit.source: The `switchLevelType` parameter identifies the type that is used by the switch to determine if a trace should be written; for example, the type of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSwitch.Level%2A> property of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSwitch> class is <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel>.
trans-unit.target: `switchLevelType`参数标识的类型的交换机用于确定是否应写入跟踪; 例如，<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSwitch.Level%2A><xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSwitch>类是<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel></xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSwitch>属性</xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSwitch.Level%2A>的类型

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> that determines whether a trace should be written.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>，它确定是否应写入一个跟踪。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type that determines whether a trace should be written.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置确定是否应写入一个跟踪的类型。

trans-unit.source: The level property of a switch is not necessarily named `Level`; for example, the level property of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch> class is <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 交换机级别属性不一定是名为`Level`; 例如，<xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch>类是<xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch>的级别属性

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> that determines whether a trace should be written.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>，它确定是否应写入一个跟踪。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The set operation failed because the value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 设置操作失败，因为值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
